0: Looks like some areas could use some updating but overall a nice average place
My wife and I stayed at the Hilton due to extensive plumbing repairs at our nearby home
The room was large but could use upgrading
Looked like room had not been updated in 20 years
The decor in the rooms and throughout the hotel is perfectly functional but dated looks like it was last done in the 90s and could use a refresh
Elevators were down and a couple of the maintenance men let us ride down the service elevator with them
The hotel should either block off entirely the section under renovation or at least alert guests to the fact that renovations are underway before they reserve a room
This hotel has not been renovated in close to 30 years
1: HOTEL IS BEING UPGRADED MORE THAN 50 IS ALREADY DONE AND WE WERE PUT UP IN ONE OF THE REFURBISHED ROOMS

Great newly renovated room and super friendly staff
First the hotel is wonderful recently renovated and great to be in
